item.title: Using Hugo and GitHub Pages for my blog
item.description: My Experience with using Hugo and deploying to Github Pages.

Delete the relevant section in .gitmodules file [submodule "public"] path = public url = https://github.com/thedaxshepherd/ds-mainroad2-public.git Stage the .gitmodules changes via command line git add .gitmodules Delete the relevant sections from .git/config, which look like: [submodule "public"] url = https://github.com/thedaxshepherd/ds-mainroad2-public.git active = true run git rm --cached path/to/submodule git rm --cached /.git/modules/public Run rm -rf .git/modules/submodule_name rm -rf .git/modules/public Commit the change Delete the now untracked submodule files rm -rf path/to/submodule
